featured_projects.name: Sweeta
featured_projects.description:
Made an Open-Source tool to remove Sora 2 Watermarks in Less than 72 Hours of it's release.

For educational and research use only, urging OpenAI to be harsher with visual watermarks, uses LaMA inpainting and intelligent detection algorithms to remove watermarks without losing quality.

featured_projects.name: TREAT
featured_projects.description: TREAT is an AI-powered platform for trigger recognition in movies and TV, making content more accessible and enjoyable.

featured_projects.name: Backdooms
featured_projects.description:
One of the top HN Posts of 2025, [cited by an ex-NASA Scientist](https://www.researchgate.net/publication/392716839_Encoding_Software_For_Perpetuity_A_Compact_Representation_Of_Apollo_11_Guidance_Code) on his independent research paper. 

 A Game inspired by DOOM and the Backrooms inside a single QR code, less than 2.4kB in size, using a custom compression pipeline using GZip with Zlib Headers.

featured_projects.name: MiniLMs
featured_projects.description:
My ongoing study learning about AI Models architecturally and making fun little chatbots from it. 

 Currently finished development of SYNEVA - a <3kb Markov Chain type Chatbot inspired by ELIZA that is actually fun to talk to and can tell how many r's are in strawberry (makes for some amazing X replies) and passively working on 15ABELLA, a 15Kb tiny Neural Network chatbot.

featured_projects.name: SecondYou
featured_projects.description:
A Private, Local-First AI that Thinks and Writes like You, runs on a finetuned version of Gemma3N made to embody you. 

 Has access to your texts, emails, blogs, social media and more to create your AI persona. Ideated during the Nas Daily AI Summer Residency.

featured_projects.name: ThisWebsiteIsNotOnline
featured_projects.description: An AI powered website where every single URL you can think of exists.

featured_projects.name: MEOW
featured_projects.description:
Top Show-HN for 3 days, became a memecoin that reached $200k and went viral on Web-3 Circles on X, helped me pay for my entire college tuition. 

 The most Purr-fect Image File Format for your AI workflows, PNG on steroids.
